question: What do the Upanishads teach us about Brahman?

enhanced_query_object.final_query_string: sat-cit-ānanda turiya Upanishadic philosophy ātman Brahman's manifestation. Brahmana Texts prajñānam brahma Brahmanical philosophy Brahman realization Upanishadic philosophy. neti neti Brahman
enhanced_query_object.user_query: What do the Upanishads teach us about Brahman?

query.original: What do the Upanishads teach us about Brahman?

verses.content: yathā karman sambandhin puruṣa sūrya ātman sthāvara jaṅgama ādi sarva prāṇin ātman tva vac brāhmaṇa mantra ca sūrya ātman ityādi tathā eva etad brahman etad indra ityādi upakram sarva prāṇin ātman tva yat ca sthāvara sarva tad prajñā netra iti upasaṃhṛ
tasmāt etad pathin etad ka etad brahman etad satya yad etad para brahman ātman jñāna na anya pathin vid ayana iti mantra varṇa
prajñāna brahman utpatti sthiti laya kāla pratiṣṭhā prajñā āśraya iti artha
iha api ka idam ātman iti upakram prajñā ātman tva eva prajñāna brahman iti darśay

yāvat idam evam yathā vac idam ātman na vid tāvat idam bāhya anitya dṛṣṭi lakṣaṇa upādhi ātman tva upe avidyā upādhi dharma ātman man brahman ādi stamba paryanta deva tiryañc nara sthāna punar punar āvṛt avidyā kāma karman vaśa saṃsṛ
